content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: On what point do the debaters agree?

choices.label: Daily exercise at school is important.
Cafeteria proceeds help fund school activities.
Schools should provide healthy food choices.

content.answer: Schools should provide healthy food choices.
